embed.title: Link your account to complete verification
embed.description: To get full access to the server (sending messages, application and complaint channels), follow the link below and link your Steam and Discord account.
embed.guide:
1. Go to the project website https://unionteams.ru/
2. Login to your Personal account via Steam
3. Link your Discord account in the Personal account

embeds.role_value:
🟢 Obtaining a role:
> Click on the button below and select the desired roles. New ticket will be created for your request.

🔴 Removing a role:
> Click on the button below and select the roles you want to remove.

📣 Alerts:
> Click on the buttons below if you want to be notified of events on the server or other.

listener.no_assigned: Can't remove any role that you have.
listener.request_title:
Select roles you want to request.
*Clear selection, if you you selected wrong roles.*
Press 'Other role/-s' if desired role is not present.

When done - press 'Continue'.
listener.request_empty: Can't request any selected role. You may already have those roles.
listener.remove_title:
Select roles you want to remove.
*You will not be able to assign some of the removed roles back.*
listener.remove_failed: Couldn't complete your role removal request. See message bellow.
listener.toggle_failed: Couldn't add/remove requested role. See message bellow and report it to the server Administration.
listener.ticket_exists: You already have an opened ticket, please refer to {channel}.
listener.cant_create: Failed to crate new ticket. Contact the server Administration.
listener.close_failed: Couldn't close this ticket. Report this to bot developer.
listener.no_member: User that is requesting roles not found. Maybe, they left this server.
listener.role_failed: I was unable to assign roles to the user.
listener.role_added: Request approved, roles assigned to user.
listener.role_none: There aren't any roles that can be assigned. Manually assign user requested roles.
listener.is_closed: This ticket is already closed. Assign roles manualy or press `Close` button.
listener.close_request:
Hey! {user}, support have indicated that the ticket is now resolved. Would you like to close the ticket or do you have further questions? React below accordingly.

If no response {time} the ticket will automatically close itself. To prevent timed close please press cancel.
listener.close_auto:
Hi! {user}, this ticket has not received a response for some time. Do you want to close the ticket or is your request still unresolved? React below accordingly.

If no response {time} the ticket will automatically close itself. To prevent timed close please press cancel.
listener.user_left: Sadly, the user that created this ticket has left the server. If they rejoin, it will not automatically re-add them.
listener.claimed: The ticket has been successfully claimed by {user}.
listener.unclaimed: The ticket has been successfully un-claimed.
listener.delete_countdown: This ticket will be closed in 5 seconds.

location.name: location
location.help: The category this ticket is created in (ignored for thread-type tags)

message.name: message
message.help: This message is sent upon ticket creation (supports {username} / {tag_username})

support_roles.name: support_roles
support_roles.help: Support roles that will be able to see this ticket

ticket_name.name: ticket_name
ticket_name.help: This is the name of the ticket that is created (supports {username})

modify.not_found: Tag by the provided ID not found.
modify.no_options: No tag's values to be updated.

view.not_found: Tag by the provided ID not found.
view.name: Ticket's name

delete.not_found: Tag by the provided ID not found.

autoclose.name: autoclose
autoclose.help: Asks ticket's author if ticket can be closed. Enter 0 to disable, or time in hours.

author_left.name: author_left
author_left.help: When ticket's author leaves server, should created ticket be closed?

automation.no_options: No tickets settings to be updated.
automation.changed_left: > When ticket's author leaves, ticket will be closed: {left}.

close.not_ticket: This channel is not a ticket.

rclose.help: Sends a close request to ticket author
rclose.not_ticket: This channel is not a ticket.
rclose.already_requested: This ticket already requested for closure.

user.name: user
user.help: Select user to be added to this ticket

add.not_ticket: This channel is not a ticket.
add.not_self: You can't add yourself, ticket creator or me.

user.name: user
user.help: Select user to be removed from this ticket

remove.not_ticket: This channel is not a ticket.
remove.not_self: You can't remove yourself, ticket creator or me.

add.help: Add a role to the specified user
add.failed: Unable to add selected role to the user.

remove.help: Remove a role from the specified user
remove.failed: Unable to remove selected role from the user.

removeall.help: Remove role from all users in the server

user.name: user
user.help: Select user to which assign this role

duration.name: duration
duration.help: For how long to assign this role (Example: 2h, 2w5d (w-week, d-day, h-hour))

delete.name: delete
delete.help: Delete this role, after time has passed? (default-false)

assign.incorrect_user: Selected member can't be assigned role.

cancel.not_found: Selected role is not assigned temporary to this user.

extend.help: Extend temporary role time for user

duration.name: duration
duration.help: For how long to extend this role (Example: 2h, 2w5d (w-week, d-day, h-hour))

extend.not_found: Selected role is not assigned temporary to this user.
extend.done: Extended temporary role {role} assignment for user {user} until {until}.

checkrank.help: (CRITICAL!) Check if users in selected role has selected rank on this connected Gmod server

role.name: role
role.help: Select role whose users to check (role VIP/Donate Admin)

rank.name: rank
rank.help: Select rank for which to check

checkservers.help: (CRITICAL!) Check if users in selected role has joined selected server

role.name: role
role.help: Select role whose users to check

server.name: server
server.help: Enter server ID which users must be joined (Helper bot must join it)

checkservers.no_helper: Helper bot is not enabled, this command will not run (contact developer).
checkservers.no_guild: Server by provided ID not found. Either ID is incorrect or Helper bot has not joined this server.

report.name: Report message
report.done: Message has been reported to the server moderation!
report.title: Message reported
